trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded"></xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved"></xref> events raised for component-level events.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving"> </xref>, och <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved"> </xref> händelser som aktiverats för komponentnivå händelser.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ComponentEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en ComponentEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Läs mer om händelsehanteraren delegater [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
